memory: To achieve the "mission" as soon as possible, I plan to head east from the starting point to reach the green key. After acquiring the key, I will navigate to the green locked door and use the key to unlock it. Then, I will go through the door and continue east and then south to reach the purple box. Once I reach the location of the purple box, I will pick it up to complete the mission.
